Articles.Content:
Hello,

Ever since 1.1 came out my crew portraits have not been appearing in the bottom right hand corner.  Is this happening to anyone else, and is there a fix? I have no mods that should affect crew portraits either.
Hi! Could you do me a favor? Go into the Alt-F12 Debug menu and check to see if the kerbals who are missing are alive. If so, we're having the same problem, and I can go from there. Thanks!
